summary: This document appears to be an email or memo listing numerous civil lawsuits related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, including cases filed by victims, appeals regarding sealed documents, and a lawsuit involving Donald Trump. It provides a spreadsheet-like overview of legal actions in New York and Florida federal courts.

persons.name: Giuffrey
persons.context: Named as plaintiff in lawsuit against Ghislaine Maxwell (Giuffrey v. Maxwell) in the Southern District of New York, which was settled.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Named as defendant in multiple civil lawsuits, including Giuffrey v. Maxwell and another suit with Epstein.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Named as defendant in numerous civil lawsuits in Southern District of Florida and in a lawsuit with Maxwell.

persons.name: Jane Doe
persons.context: Referenced as plaintiff in multiple civil suits against Epstein in Southern District of Florida, with most cases settled.

persons.name: Trump
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to lawsuits involving Epstein (Epstein/Trump lawsuits), with cases voluntarily dismissed or settled.

connections.description: Giuffrey was plaintiff and Maxwell was defendant in civil lawsuit Giuffrey v. Maxwell.
Both named as defendants in lawsuit 17-cv-00616 in Southern District of New York.
Multiple Jane Doe plaintiffs filed civil suits against Epstein in Southern District of Florida.
Mentioned together in Epstein/Trump lawsuits, though specific nature of legal relationship not detailed.

events.title: Document creation
events.description: Email or memo listing Epstein-related lawsuits was sent or created.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: Federal court district where several lawsuits against Maxwell and Epstein were filed.

locations.name: Southern District of Florida
locations.context: Federal court district where multiple Jane Doe civil suits against Epstein were filed.

locations.name: New York, NY 10007
locations.context: Location of Assistant United States Attorney's office at One Saint Andrew's Plaza.

keyFacts: Numerous civil lawsuits were filed against Jeffrey Epstein by Jane Doe plaintiffs in Southern District of Florida, with at least 15 cases listed as settled between 2008-2010.
Ghislaine Maxwell was defendant in Giuffrey v. Maxwell (settled) and another lawsuit with Epstein (17-cv-00616) that was in discovery as of document date.
There were appeals regarding sealing of documents in the 2nd Circuit Court related to the Maxwell case.
Lawsuits involving both Epstein and Donald Trump are referenced, with cases voluntarily dismissed or settled.
The document provides a comprehensive list of case numbers and statuses, suggesting systematic tracking of Epstein-related litigation.
